readable.title: 3694219419_a7a83d4886
readable.content: A group of adults and children play with a parachute outdoors . A group of children are waving a large cloth up and down . A group of people holding up a bed sheet like a parachute while two people run underneath to fetch a soccer ball . Many people raise a large sheet of fabric above their heads . The group of people is holding a large sheet .
